H0.text: where did the battle of passchendaele happen. Ypres

H1.text: where did the battle of passchendaele happen. Amiens

H2.text: where did the battle of passchendaele happen. Cambrai

H3.text: where did the battle of passchendaele happen. Passendale

A4.text: The battle took place on the Western Front, from July to November 1917, for control of the ridges south and east of the Belgian city of Ypres in West Flanders.

A5.text: Passchendaele (now Passendale) lies on the last ridge east of Ypres, 5 mi (8 km) from Roulers (now Roeselare), a junction of the Bruges-(Brugge)-to-Kortrijk railway.

A6.text: Passchendaele, The Third Battle of Ypres, 1917.
